website_summaries.verdict: Alaskan salmon is the only ingredient in this freeze-dried treat, although some of these take a bit of beating in shipping.
pros: All natural dog treat, made from 100% human grade salmon
Made in USA, from Alaskan salmon
Contains no soy, grains, gluten, or other fillers
Contains Omega 3, Omega 6, and a variety of vitamins and minerals
cons: The per ounce cost is pretty high here
Some buyers said that this option arrived crushed, or broken down into granules
The 3-ounce size is smaller than other options

customer_reviews.title: Bag full Crumbs and Skins!  Very few real chunk pieces of Salmon.
customer_reviews.text: The vast majority of this bag was about as useful as the crumbs in the bottom of a bag of chips. Lots of pieces of just skin in the top of the bag (which my dogs can’t chew up.. and about 3/4 mini sized crumbs! Certainly NOT worth the price. I’ve ordered other brands and gotten much better. See photos of normal paper plate full of crumbs. I would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: huntersgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and meat is dark orange - natural not ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and meat is dark orange - natural not dyed, which is typical of Alaskan wild salmon. Packed full and not half empty like some of the other brands! Like the fact that product is handled/ packed in human grade facilities, so that it’s safe for the dog. About time pet companies focused on ethical manufacturing rather than treating pets as a business and producing junk as their food.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Our Pups' Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Who knew our dogs would love stinky salmon treats so much? We are training two service dogs and need to have a plethora of treats on hand at all times. These would be considered "higher value" treats and the fact that the scent saturates the kibble I put them in the bag with makes them even more valuable to me. They're freeze dried, so nothing will get on your fingers and they're easy for the dogs to snap up and digest.
customer_reviews.author: chris wright

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Is ok. I used to make salmon jerkey for my pup but its a bit greasy so I opted for these; she dosnt love these like those (i sampled both as a human and these are a 1 on the taste scale while the salmon jerkey is like a 6 to the human palette) but its ok she's started eating these and atleast its grease free.
customer_reviews.author: ZOBO

customer_reviews.title: Not at all the product pictured (in pic #3).
customer_reviews.text: Was packed in a box with a 36# bag of dog food!! Pulverized the product (but good packaging). Why would you put freeze dried anything in with that size object??? It’s just a packet of dust with tiny pieces. The 3rd pic is what the product is supposed to look like. Very saddened by this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR CATS
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this salmon was not impressive. Lots of grey meat attached to the skin. This food may be fine for a larger dog, but small animals like cats can not chew the tough skins. Following the comments that this was fine for cats, I gave some of the very tough skin to my cats and will never do that again. They could not chew or swallow the skin and there is ALOT of skin in a bag. I will purchase dried salmon without skin and not waste money on salmon skins.
customer_reviews.author: jllavine

customer_reviews.title: Half bag of dust
customer_reviews.text: More than half the bag is dust. I did not pay for dust. Plus, I do not think this is the correct size from what it is labeled.
customer_reviews.author: F T. A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Paws Up
customer_reviews.text: I started off being frustrated with the packaging. The packaging broke off when I was trying to rip it open. I cut across the top, but then I was unable to open the package. I decided to just cut the whole package open and store the treats in a Tupperware container. That being said, my kitties absolutely loved these. I broke them into smaller pieces so they would be easier to handle. Both cats were rather portly when I adopted them so when I give treats I try to get them to run to the treat. I have never seen my big boy run so fast. If he is sprinting to get more, I know it’s good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: My little min pin can't get enough of these freeze dried salmon pieces. I put them on his dry food as a topper and he will eat these off first before even touching his wet food. The smell is a bit strong, but he loves them so I just keep my nose away from the bag. The 2 downfalls with this brand are 1) the price just for 3oz and 2) most of the pieces are crushed into dust so it's more like shredded freeze dried salmon

customer_reviews.title: What is probably ok for dogs is not for cats
customer_reviews.text: Large pieces of freeze dried skin, not just meat. The skin pieces have led to multiple cats heaving and throwing up their normal food. I have to break off all the meat and throw away all the skin or cut down the skin to rice-sized pieces. Very time consuming. would not suggest for cats, although they love the salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Salmon Skin- Pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: I wondered why these treats were so inexpensive compared to other brands. I read the label carefully and it seemed to check the boxes with 100% salmon, no fillers, additives, etc. When I opened the bag almost every single piece was 99% salmon skin- the by-product of the good stuff, the secondary commodity. For the price, this tracks, though could be even cheaper to the end-user. My pets choked up the larger pieces that were hard, fibrous skin they could not chew easily. Would not recommend for smaller pets and would not be substantial for larger breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Nutritious Treats!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves these Salmon treats! He receives them when he responds to commands; being housebroken, already knows how to sit on command! Play fetch; will follow me around the yard without a leash attached, allows me to clean him every time we come back into the house. We rescued him four weeks ago; he is only two months old! We are thrilled with these super nutritious treats; it makes me feel good knowing he is receiving something that he loves, yet it is perfect for his body! I highly recommend! Thank you! Carolintallahassee
customer_reviews.author: Carolintallahassee

customer_reviews.title: What’s all the skins and fins doing in the bag.  Looks like scraps
customer_reviews.text: My Lhasa Apsos did not want to taste these treats as they normally do with every other foods I give them. The one who eats everything turned her nose up and walked away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs AND cats come running
customer_reviews.text: These are a fan favorite in my household (not so much by the humans, who are sensitive to the fishy smell, but c'mon, it's pure salmon so of COURSE there's going to be a smell), but my dogs and cats love them! I have a boxer-pit mix, a lab-something giant mix, and panther-sized cats, all of whom believe the sun rises and sets on these. Thank you for introducing a new crack treat to our household! :)
customer_reviews.author: Corrina B.

customer_reviews.title: Spendy, but nutritious and my dogs LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: There is little to no odor due to the freeze drying, they use the whole fish so skin and meat are present. The dogs love it as a topper on their kibble and we use it to keep their coats shiny and healthy. Wish it wasn't so expensive, but my pups are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela G. Birt

customer_reviews.title: Doggo loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes insane for these. We save them for when we really want her to listen or to stand still for her shots. The only down side is one package I got was smaller pieces and more crushed up / more powdery. Probably has to do with how it was handled. They’re kinda pricy so I don’t use them for every day treats but dog definitely knows when we’re bringing out the good stuff when she hears this bag. They do smell strong, which I expected since it’s just dried fish.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: He LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: My little Buddy loves fish, so I thought he might like this. I was wrong. He LOVES them! He went crazy for them! I swear it is like catnip for dogs! This is definitely going on my permanent monthly list for Amazon. Thank you Amazon for another great product!
customer_reviews.author: DR3

customer_reviews.title: Crumbled
customer_reviews.text: Crushed to fine crumbs. Impossible to offer dogs as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive stomachs!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: This item is exactly as described. My Labrador retriever has a sensitive stomach and cannot get enough of these. Cons (-ish): The bottom of the bag is dried salmon powder but it's to be expected. (It's like the bottom of a Cheez It bag for adults/kids) It's stinky but...again...what else would you expect?
customer_reviews.author: MaybeJackie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I recently got freeze dried treats for my cat who is pre-diabetic with dental issues after I found out that the veterinarian he was treating with was selling me teeth-cleaning freeze-dried chews with SUGAR in them (sugar causes diabetes and dental problems). Needless to say I found another vet. So I've been looking for labels that have pure ingredients. This has just one: salmon. The pieces are large so they can be some work for my cat sometimes but it's great quality and I love that I'm feeding my cat something that's pure fish.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Stinky yes! But my 3 dogs love the taste!!
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive but my dogs love everything salmon! I have a diabetic husky that can’t eat carbs. So I buy him salmon treats. These stink as do all salmon treats but as I said he loves them. My other two large dogs love these treats also. So I buy these for all three!! I’m a repeat customer. I just hold my nose! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Gin

customer_reviews.title: This is the best treat for my 8 months doggy and two lovely ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best treat for my 8 months doggy and two lovely cats. They all love it so much. I just give a little bit of bigger chunk for doggy and smaller chunk for cats. It is wild salmon NOT FARM RAISED and made in USA. Good price too. I will order two more packages today.
customer_reviews.author: SO

customer_reviews.title: Yummy  Salmon Fan
customer_reviews.text: Our newly adopted Greyhound, Aslan, took one taste of these salmon treats and glued his eyes to the bag, lifting his paw to beg for more. I just wish they came in a larger sized bag. Whenever I head toward the cupboard he beats me there, paw raised, grin on his face, hoping for his fishy treat !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY but treats are hard to feed
customer_reviews.text: I love supporting smaller businesses and also feeding my dog single ingredient treats. He eats raw meat with organs (no kibble or processed anything!) so basically, paleo for dogs, the wolf diet. These treats align with that HEALTHY lifestyle, HOWEVER they are extremely small, 1/4 of the bag is almost like dried salmon dust. This makes its hard to feed to my dog without making a mess. Putting them in his bowl kind of defeats the purpose of feeding as a reward treat. If they could figure out how to make the treats more of a "larger piece" rather than its current shredded state, i would feed these to my dog for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves.
customer_reviews.text: Used a few pieces of these little cubes or cut up piece of skin into my medium size dogs dry food, add water, stir and microwave for 20 seconds. Wait about 5 minutes til cooled and food plums up, and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: S.True

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are bite sized and I use them for tricks and these snacks have their attention. They are the perfect size and they are good for them too. They are human grade and made in the USA. Get these!
customer_reviews.author: Cowabungababe

customer_reviews.title: my cats would sell me for freeze-dried salmon
customer_reviews.text: they LOVE it they demand it they want all their dry food to be sprinkled with bits of freeze-dried salmon or they turn their noses at it the only thing is the skin is too tough for them and that's easily a quarter of the volume
customer_reviews.author: Katya A

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: The sellers are awesome they quickly refunded price when didn’t work out for me is a great product but not one of my dogs favorites just my dog is weird I thought they look delicious but the sellers are fantastic seller so we’re gonna try some of their other products
customer_reviews.author: ReedTwanger

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves but pricey!
customer_reviews.text: My hard to please Yorkiepoo loves these treat.. it's real salmon and the smell is incredibly intense so look out! The treats came in whole pieces thanks to proper shipping the price is a bit much but she loves it .. but this will be a once every other month type of treat.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: A Canine Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Freeze Dried Salmon Dog Training Treats are my dog's absolute favorite! There is a variety of treats in this house but the dried salmon gets my two dogs standing on their back legs. There is always a backup package so we don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: Daga1968

customer_reviews.title: Mostly unusable as treats, too fragile. Use as topper.
customer_reviews.text: Giving 4 stars since the bag arrived with much of the treats in very small pieces. Photo shows large chunks.The bag was smashed. I can still use as a food topper but this company perhaps needs to consider a better packaging option for such a fragile treat?
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable quality
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie loves it mixed in with her Freeze dried dog food and add some warm water let it soak, and Voila... only the best for my little girl and IMK9 are the freeze dried human quality salmon treats I chose for her. Her coat and skin are great, less irritation and shines like a diamond. 5-Stars
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: My Very Picky Dog LOVES These!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a hard time finding treats for my very picky small dog (she's 15 lbs.) and I want them to the healthy for her as well. I wasn't sure about these but had to try them - she's refused the eat so many other treats I've tried. She LOVES these - no kidding. And since they're good for her, I'm glad I bought them and will be buying them again and again.
customer_reviews.author: OrchidLuvr

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Boston Terriers LOVE these treats! I love giving my dogs all natural food/treats so it's a win win.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: wow-
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is great. the first thing we noticed is how much softer snd silkier out fur baby's coat was. and the super bonus is she does not shed anywhere as bad as she used to. I use it as an add on topper for her meals and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CG Veach

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Our pup ❤️ these treats. He picked the salmon over almost all the other treats. The only thing I don’t like is that there are two many crumps.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: My two rescue Chihuahuas are totally INSANE about these, ...
customer_reviews.text: My two rescue Chihuahuas are totally INSANE about these, BUT I have to cut the dried salmon skins up into smaller pieces so they can chew them. Also, my 14 yr. old cat loves them too and tries to steal them from the dogs any chance she gets. Please make some irresistible treats for cats!
customer_reviews.author: Grannymama

customer_reviews.title: Best doggy and also kitty treats ever!!
customer_reviews.text: “I got these for my 4 month old Siberian Husky puppy, and she loves them, so does my 2 cats, which is great because she and the cats needs the fish oil and DHA for brain and eye development as well as for her skin and coat found in this product. My vet loves that she and the cats gets these treats. This product I would recommend to everyone who has dogs and or cats!!
customer_reviews.author: ScottishCherokeeLass

customer_reviews.title: Stinky but dog LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: Dog absolutely loves them so 5 stars on taste but I won't confirm that. Dog stayed by the bag for an hour waiting for another treat. She had just had mouth surgery and wanted something healthy and wasn't difficult to chew. Again she LOVES them.
customer_reviews.author: KS working mom

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. The treats look as if they are just freeze dried salmon. Most of my dog's friends like these treats too. We usually share BUT the price makes sharing prohibitive. I am not purchasing a bag every week.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy J

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVE them.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these! I have been looking for something to help with my pugs coat, something that she would actually eat. Her fur is looking. So much better now, so much so that these are going to be a regular purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Neece64

customer_reviews.title: Serve crunchy or soak some in warm water for a few seconds and I serve over his dry food.
customer_reviews.text: These dried wild salmon premium treats are practically the only treats my dog loves. I usually soak some in warm water for a few seconds and then drain the water and put the salmon on top of his food. He really likes them so they must be high quality. My dog will not eat farm raised salmon interestingly enough.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Don't really like it
customer_reviews.text: The bits have some skin on them, that makes them hard to crumble or break. I feel that the skin is sharp and worried it would hurt the dogs mouth. I bought these because my usually brand was delayed in shipping to me because of the covid-19. I will not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great price for the amount of freeze dried salmon
customer_reviews.text: I actually got these treats for my cat and dog. It's a great price for the amount of freeze dried salmon. Both loved them but I had to peel the skin off before giving the salmon pieces to my cat. The skin is super touch and can be really sharp on the corners. A skin free option would be super appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go nuts for these! I'm trying to get my dogs used to a nail grinder and I use these salmon treats as rewards. They're a bit pricy (likely bc the bag says 'human grade' with no fillers) but worth it for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Qttxchik

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch? It was all powder.
customer_reviews.text: Product is usually good, but came almost completely disintegrated (ok more like 70% powder, but still that’s bad). Won’t be able to use as treats but maybe just on the dogs food. He does love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dog does not like it
customer_reviews.text: Even though it looks delicious and smells good our dog does not like it.
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: Zeus loves these treats!
customer_reviews.text: I feed my cat a variety of natural minimally processed sources of meat and fish to keep his gut healthy. He absolutely loves these salmon treats. I plan to keep them in regular rotation in his diet.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiaaddie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this all natural product. Lebo gives it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: My Vet and Groom reccomend this treat for my poodle to help with his dry skin. It works great and he loves it. No more dry skin, slight fish smell, but worth the price if it makes my poodle happy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and versatility for pet wellness
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE this salmon! It’s really been helping with their stuff joints and dry winter skin. I would highly recommend this as a natural way to soften a dogs coat, increase their mobility and help with aging joints in senior dogs. The minute this bag pops open my dogs will do anything to get what’s inside!
customer_reviews.author: Jubal Hays

customer_reviews.title: Great lower calorie treat for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great lower calorie treat for dogs. Small pieces for larger dogs and a lot of "dust" in the bag. But we just poured that over their food. Dogs seemed to really enjoy them. Packaged well and no smell when bag is sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Mojod

customer_reviews.title: Good healthy pet snack
customer_reviews.text: I had seen mixed reviews, but chances it and my package came mostly as crumbs, so I can’t exactly give as treats. It must be sprinkled on meal. It’s fine, just not what I had in mind as I was planning on giving as treats. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treat that dogs love.
customer_reviews.text: Abit smelly. But, that is what my dogs like. I like that they are getting a good fat in a treat. Will definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Agility mom

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Treats
customer_reviews.text: I have a Crested and I bought these to help her skin. Since she has very little hair, her skin is easily dryed out. These seem to help and it is a healthy snack. And she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Florida girl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my friends dog, which I love as my own! Nyla loved the treats!
customer_reviews.author: mistie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with some pieces crumbled
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy these again as some of the pieces were crumbled and hard to give to my pet as a reward or a treat. They smell like salmon and she loves them but I need something that doesn't crumble.
customer_reviews.author: rcunni2

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Dog Treat
customer_reviews.text: A co-worker bought these and gave the treats to dogs who were brought to work during our dog days each month. My dog (beagle mix) would always return to this co-worker and aggressively beg for these and so I finally bought them as an X-Mas present after reading the packaging and ingredients, etc. Needless to say, our dog was a very happy camper. The product is high quality and worth the price and yes, my dog eats better than I do on some days.
customer_reviews.author: The Lopez’s

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing dog treat. Maybe cats would like it better?
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a “treat” for m dogs but it is shredded cardboard. My dogs don’t care for it at all. It is hard to gather a sufficient piece to reward them. Would not buy this stuff again. Very pricey too!
customer_reviews.author: Born to Read

customer_reviews.title: my dog says it is super yummy
customer_reviews.text: mommy says - be careful on hot days bc this treat is dehydrated. make sure ur dog has access to water if you give him more than a piece!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these, but..
customer_reviews.text: Yes, my dog loves them, but but why are they so expensive? Salmon isn't any more expensive than most beef cuts. Why are they 3 to 4 times the cost?
customer_reviews.author: RSM61

customer_reviews.title: Great for my diabetic dog
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my diabetic dachshund. Finding treats for him is a nightmare. And these are perfect. Long lasting. Hes excited to get them. Definitely will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Doggie crack
customer_reviews.text: Great one ingredient treat for dog with many allergies. They both go nuts for it.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: All natural and our dog LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: These treats are absolutely amazing! It's salmon...that's it. The ingredients don't get any more straightforward. Our dog LOVES these and will move heaven and earth when she hears me grab the bag. We generally use this as a topper for her kibble by mashing it up with our fingers into a fine powder that we sprinkle on her food. Great quality, a great price and your pup will really enjoy these goodies!
customer_reviews.author: Guru_Swami

customer_reviews.title: Duke loves them
customer_reviews.text: Given sparingly for special tricks. He is totally motivated to learn!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My dog lives for this treat! Pricy but worth it to see her face when she hears the foil bag open.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Best treat EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog Zelda LOVES these freeze dried salmon treats. When she hears the bag open she comes running. By the time I get the bag open, she actually gets cross-eyed from excitement. Lol. Thanks for a great product. Will need some more soon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Laba

customer_reviews.title: No scary bones!
customer_reviews.text: I love the generous quantity in the 3-oz. bag! The pieces of salmon are high quality, & there are no scary bones, like I’ve seen in another company’s freeze-dried salmon treats. My dog loves them! Thank you for providing a high-quality treat/snack for my Buddy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Marshburn

customer_reviews.title: Please your Puppy
customer_reviews.text: Doggies are VERY pleased! I'm using it to spice up their breakfast as I have one that has decided not to eat until I sit beside her and this gives her the incentive to dine alone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hillyer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Dogs enjoy too much! Save the crumbs to sprinkle on food as a treat. Tip: I do that with all treats. Expensive; don't buy but 4 xs a year.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ridley

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff, Kitty Paw Approved
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats and gobble them up. They only thing that they don't eat is the skin, that part is too tough for them.
customer_reviews.author: MonaLS

customer_reviews.title: Dehydrated but tasty... so our dogs say
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love them. I worry a little about how our dogs will digest dehydrated foods, but so far so good. They love them and no digestive problems.
customer_reviews.author: True Story

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had better salmon treats
customer_reviews.text: Lots of skin pieces and turns to dust if shaken. I’ve had better salmon treats.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Shipe

customer_reviews.title: They are cut in a good size for rewards and training
customer_reviews.text: My French Bulldog loves these treats!!! They are cut in a good size for rewards and training. Any crushed treats can easily be used as toppings for another meal. Excellent customer service as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Healthy for Shiny Coat and good for skin
customer_reviews.text: My dogs wouldn't leave me alone for these treats they enjoyed them as much as I enjoyed giving it too them and they are an awesome price as well
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: ... it then i take it it has to be good. And the reason i say that is she ...
customer_reviews.text: “what can i say if my little fur baby will eat it then i take it it has to be good.And the reason i say that is she is so picky about anything i give her ,somethings she just won't eat.So when i give her something she likes and eats it all the time has to be good.”
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had to use sparingly on my dogs because of fat content %, but they loved it. A perfect product! All natural. Worth buying
customer_reviews.author: DeCarla Day

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: These treats are exactly what I was looking for! We have a newly diabetic dog and I needed treats that would not affect his glucose. They are approved by our vet. And approved by our Aussie Cooper! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Diane Burdick

customer_reviews.title: A high value treat for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love them for nosework training. A high value treat
customer_reviews.author: LizD

customer_reviews.title: Dogs enjoyed them!
customer_reviews.text: My Golden Retrievers really enjoyed these salmon treats. They are a healthy alternative to a majority of treat products out on the market. Would order more if they were a little less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Ann M

customer_reviews.title: Tiny little pieces
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. My dogs loved them but they were tiny little pieces....mostly crumbs. Pricey for the size and quality received.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I have a Siberian Husky that I try and feed ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Siberian Husky that I try and feed fish treats to. He is a careful eater. He refuses to eat this product. He does eat a piece of raw, frozen fish every morning.
customer_reviews.author: mistydaygirl

customer_reviews.title: Pieces not as big as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows nice size pieces of freeze dried salmon. When I received the package it was mostly small pieces. Not sure if that was due to the shipping or the actual product. That’s my only complaint is the size of the treats. I was thinking they would look more like the picture
customer_reviews.author: William T Urbanski

customer_reviews.title: It's 100% salmon.  My cat likes it, too
customer_reviews.text: This is an affordable 100% salmon treat. Sometimes kitty won't eat his food, and I can shred a few flakes as a topper that he can't resist!
customer_reviews.author: Julia D.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended

product_meta.title: IMK9 All Natural Freeze Dried Salmon Dog Treats – with Omega 3 and Omega 6 Fish Oil – by – 100% Pure Fish with Skin – Gluten Free, Grain Free, No Soy – Made in The USA
product_meta.description:
Delicious 100% Salmon Dog Treats Created By Real Dog Lovers

As dog lovers, we want the very best for our pets. Sadly, when we went looking for treats, we couldn’t find it. Mass produced dog treats are often incredibly unhealthy and devoid of nutrition, or made from low-grade ingredients that dogs just don’t enjoy. So we went all the way to Alaska to create the best treats on the market from prime chunks of freeze dried salmon.

100% Human Grade Salmon – Made In The USA

Most other “salmon” dog treats are made in China from fish guts. We wanted better than that for our dog. So we’ve only used whole, prime cuts of human food grade salmon. You can pick up these chunks and see for yourself that they contain nothing but salmon. You could even soak them in water and see the same type of salmon that you might get on your own plate!

Salmon – Nature’s Superfood For Dogs

Salmon is incredibly healthy and packed with nutrients, especially Omega 3 and Omega 6 fatty acids. These oils are essential for pet health, and your beloved dog will benefit massively from them. As you use these treats, you’ll begin to see your dog becoming healthier. When you see your pooch’s coat getting shinier and your dog becoming more energetic, you’ll also know that the internal organs are in better health.

100% Money Back Guarantee

We wouldn’t give these treats to our dog, Ginger, if we didn’t think they were the very best. We’re confident that you and your dog will agree these treats are the healthiest, safest and most delicious dog treats on the market. If you don’t, we’ll be more than happy to give you a full and immediate refund. No hassle, no delays, and no questions asked. 

Get The Peace Of Mind That Comes From Knowing You’re Feeding Your Dog The Very Best – Pick Up These Salmon Dog Treats Today
feature_bullets: ★ DOGS LOVE THEM: Your beloved pooch will go absolutely crazy for these all natural treats. Nothing is more delicious to your furry friend than freeze dried salmon. They are tasty enough to keep your dog motivated during training, correct behavioral problems, or just as a heavenly treat.

★ 100% HUMAN GRADE SALMON: This salmon isn’t just certified safe for dogs. It’s so good that actually safe for humans too! There’s nothing but 100% freeze dried salmon, with the skin still on. No grain, no soy, no gluten, and no artificial additives. Soak them in water and see them turn into prime chunks of salmon before your eyes!

★ FULL OF OMEGA 3, OMEGA 6 AND OTHER VITAMINS: Nature has absolutely packed these treats with nutrients, including vital fatty acids like Omega 3 and 6, Magnesium, Potassium, Zinc, Vitamins A, B12, D and more. They all work together for more vitality for the furriest member of your family.

★ MADE IN THE USA: Many other dogsnacks are made in countries like China, with lower food standards than the US. These fish treats are made right here in the USA, so you can have the peace of mind that you’re only feeding your K9 the very best, for a healthy heart, healthy coat, and long life.

★ 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We love our pets as much as you do. That’s why we wanted to create the healthiest, highest grade and most delicious protein dog treats in the world. If you aren’t completely satisfied with the quality of these treats, then we’ll give you a full refund, no questions asked.
